name: Dream #46
description:
Dream #46 is a contemplative ride game in an idyllic world that could come out of a dream.



You control a small sailboat in a tiny world made up of 6 areas where each of them has its own color palette, its inhabitants.



Navigate wherever you want among what is on offer. The idea is that you have a good time.



Scrolls are scattered across the dream. Collect one and a positive affirmation will present itself to motivate you...about you.

Like any dream, this one has an end. To do this, you must collect petals in order to reconstitute flowers and create a bouquet of flowers to finally give it as an offering...

Have a nice dream.
